data.name: Girls for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
With this Girls DLC for Clip Maker you will get 10 girls for making excellent videos, films and clips:

JennieK
KimJ
LalisaM
LisaS
MargotR
PriyankaCh
RoseP
SabinaH
SinaD
SinaD 2
UrassayaS

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

data.short_description: Girls for Clip maker - have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters can not be nude, you are not able to take off all clothes. And all characters of this DLC are loaded with special textures. Those textures has painted over the intimate parts of the body and completely cut off the female genitals, there is a hole instead of genitals. If you would like to undress them completely you should have installed the 18+ DLC. Only in this case you will be able to remove all clothes and characters will have the correct textures on all intimate parts.
